title: Setup Flow Chart - Replacement Keys and Keyless ECM

body.body: Setup Flow Chart - Replacement Keys and Keyless ECM
It can take up to 30 minutes to complete the system pairings, downloads and calibrations necessary for correct keyless ECM setup.
Before starting the setup procedure, ensure the battery voltage is at least 12.8 Volts.
An approved battery charger suitable for use with maintenance free batteries, may be used to maintain battery charge during the setup process.

metadata.products: PJ1; D74; DR4; DS4; PB1; D71; DSB; DSA; DSX; DS1; NN6
